issue.title: #__sdi_order : remark size
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

From V2 to V4, sdi_order remark size has been shortened from 4000 to 500 chars.
We have to extend this to 4000, otherwise we cannot migrate V2 data. (Or have to truncate them)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Seems to work ! Thanks
